Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the village of Rye Brook occupancy tax for two years
Summary: Extends the village of Rye Brook occupancy tax until September 1, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 381 of the laws of 2010 amending the tax law relating to the imposition of an occupancy tax in the village of Rye Brook, in relation to extending the expiration thereof
